basics.name: Ankit Prajapati
basics.label: React & React Native Dveloper
basics.summary: Experienced Programming Analyst with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in Node.js, Angular, React, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, serverless microservices & microfrontends. Strong engineering professional with a Master of Computer Applications - MCA focused in Study from GLS Institute of Computer Technology (MCA Program) (SFI)-Ahmedabad 509.

AWS - EC2, S3, Lambda with layers , SES, SQS, API Gateway, Batch

work.name: Third Rock Techkno
work.description: A leading IT services company providing robust software development solutions to startups and enterprises globally
highlights: Learned JavaScript, TypeScript and Node.js with MongoDB, Elasticsearch, MySQL and other Restful API & backend related things.

projects.name: Confidential
projects.description: A Digital collection library ( similar to New York Public Library's collections ) with a large amount of books. It follows IIIF - International Image Interoperability Framework for API standards ( image API, Annotation API, manifest etc.)
highlights: My first role in the project was backend the developer then later i've started working on frontend ( angular and react both ), currently i'm leading the project team.
On the backend, I've worked on serverless, microservices architecture.
On the frontend, I've created microfrontends with NX to render one frontend into another.
Worked on some of the AWS services like EC2, lambda ( with layers ), SQS, SES, Batch etc.
Setup cantaloupe image server to render JPEG2000 images with Grok and kakadu image compression tools
Deployed Apps with the help of serverless, claudia and EC2 with docker
Created Restful search & filter APIs with the help of node.js ( express ) and elasticsearch as searchDB.
Worked on OCR with tesseract to fetch text from book content for search purpose.
Created custom CMS - Rendered dynamic components with angular and NX.
Customised IIIF Manifest Editor - Digital Bodleian & IIIF Manifest Viewer - Mirador.
